body_html: Okay, with df52532 we now fail loudly when you try to take second derivatives of ops that can't be done that way. I think we're just going to rely on removing these fused ops via XLA one day as the eventual solution.
body_text: Okay, with df52532 we now fail loudly when you try to take second derivatives of ops that can't be done that way.  I think we're just going to rely on removing these fused ops via XLA one day as the eventual solution.
body: Okay, with https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/df52532ccb9a6084ed8877a5b11698fa451a8762 we now fail loudly when you try to take second derivatives of ops that can't be done that way.  I think we're just going to rely on removing these fused ops via XLA one day as the eventual solution.
